T02D1798:15b-1: shr'i gu hya sa m'a dza mandala bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D1798:15b-3: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog zhes bya ba /

T02D1798:16b-6: aom ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a /

T02D1798:16b-10: aom a'i sh'a n'a ya sv'a h'a /

T02D1798:16b-13: aom pri thi bye sv'a h'a /

T02D1798:18b-25: ma'i gdan la rang rang gi sa bon yongs su
T02D1798:18b-26: gyur pa las sku rdzogs pa la ye shes kyi
T02D1798:18b-27: 'khor lo bkug la bstim par bya ste /
T02D1798:18b-30: gtor ma yang kha zas sbyang ba'i ting de 'dzin
T02D1798:18b-31: du byas la thun mtshams bzhi ru phul nas so
T02D1798:18b-32: so'i bzlas pas mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1798:18b-33: de yang g-yas su rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa
T02D1798:18b-34: bzhag ste mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin du bya'o
T02D1798:18b-35: // g-yon du las thams cad pa'i bum pa bzhag
T02D1798:18b-36: la mchod pa dang bzlas pas mnyes par byas nas
T02D1798:18b-37: // / dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bsal du gsol zhes phrin las bcol lo //
T02D1798:18b-38: dkyil 'khor la mchod pa yang bya ste snga ma
T02D1798:18b-39: bzhin du gsol ba gdab pa yang lan gsum du
T02D1798:18b-40: bya'o // 'di dag ni bum pa sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1798:18b-42: // / de nas phyi rol du byung nas rang gi slob ma brtags la gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1798:18b-43: blo dang ldan pa theg pa chen po la dga'
T02D1798:18b-44: ba bla ma la dad cing snying rje che ba
T02D1798:18b-45: / bka' drin rjes su dran pa nga rgyal med pa bslab pa yid ches pa dang ldan pa /
T02D1798:18b-47: slob dpon la lhag par mos pa rigs dang ldan
T02D1798:18b-48: zhing sdom pa dang dam tshig la gnas pa ni
T02D1798:19a-1: che'i skyes bu zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste /
T02D1798:19a-2: 'di ni brtan pas mchog tu gzung bar rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so //
T02D1798:19a-3: de las gzhan pa'i slob ma ni dad pa sngon du 'gro bas byang chub la dmigs nas /
T02D1798:19a-4: dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang bla ma la dad pa
T02D1798:19a-5: rgya chen po byed pa yang ci rigs par gzung
T02D1798:19a-6: bar bya ste gang zag gi rim pa bzhin sbyar
T02D1798:19a-7: ro // de las gzhan pa ni slob ma dang
T02D1798:19a-8: tshogs pa'i bdag nyid gang dang yang mi ldan pa
T02D1798:19a-9: de ni 'dir mi gnang zhing dgag par bya'o //
T02D1798:19a-10: de ltar snod dang snod ma yin pa rnams brtags
T02D1798:19a-11: la slob dpon bdag nyid khang pa'i nang du 'jug
T02D1798:19a-12: go // de nas skal pa dang ldan pa'i slob mas kyang sgo drug du gnas te /
T02D1798:19a-13: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pos //
T02D1798:19a-14: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D1798:19a-15: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D1798:19a-16: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D1798:19a-17: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02D1798:19a-18: byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol //
T02D1798:19a-19: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D1798:19a-20: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D1798:19a-21: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D1798:19a-23: de ltar lan gsum gsol ba btab nas slob dpon
T02D1798:19a-24: 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas
T02D1798:19a-26: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02D1798:19a-27: gsang sngags spyod yul chog dag / khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02D1798:19a-28: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te //
T02D1798:19a-29: dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1798:19a-30: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D1798:19a-31: rdo rje gsang sngags bsgom pa yis //
T02D1798:19a-32: dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du //
T02D1798:19a-33: thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes //
T02D1798:19a-34: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de //
T02D1798:19a-35: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02D1798:19a-36: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa //
T02D1798:19a-37: dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02D1798:19a-40: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02D1798:19a-41: bu yis blo gros 'di byos shig / ces smra'o //
T02D1798:19a-42: de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D1798:19a-44: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D1798:19b-0: byang chub tu @19b sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D1798:19b-1: bdag nyid kyi lus dbul ba dang /
T02D1798:19b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang /
T02D1798:19b-3: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D1798:19b-4: sgrub pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sngom pa bzung ba dang smon lam gdab par bya'o //
T02D1798:19b-5: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs
T02D1798:19b-6: pa ni slob mas tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing
T02D1798:19b-7: bya'o // sngom pa gzung ba ni dang po slob dpon gyis bsgo ste 'di skad du /
T02D1798:19b-8: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D1798:19b-9: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02D1798:19b-10: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i//
T02D1798:19b-11: dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02D1798:19b-12: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag / blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis //
T02D1798:19b-13: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02D1798:19b-14: shes rab dril bu zhes grags so //
T02D1798:19b-15: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar gyis //
T02D1798:19b-16: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02D1798:19b-17: 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i //
T02D1798:19b-18: dam tshig sngom pa yin par gsungs //
T02D1798:19b-19: rin chen rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D1798:19b-20: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02D1798:19b-21: zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams //
T02D1798:19b-22: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02D1798:19b-23: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02D1798:19b-24: dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar gyis //
T02D1798:19b-26: dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs //
T02D1798:19b-27: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D1798:19b-28: sngom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D1798:19b-29: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya //
T02D1798:19b-30: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya //
T02D1798:19b-31: srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya //
T02D1798:19b-32: ma byin par yang mi slang ngo //
T02D1798:19b-33: 'dod chags dag kyang mi bya zhing //
T02D1798:19b-34: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02D1798:19b-35: nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba ste //
T02D1798:19b-36: chang ni rnam par spang bar bya //
T02D1798:19b-37: sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs par //
T02D1798:19b-38: bya bam yin thams cad spang //
T02D1798:19b-39: dam pa nye bar brten bya zhing //
T02D1798:19b-40: rnal 'byor pa kun bsnyen bkur bya //
T02D1798:19b-41: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dag / ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang //
T02D1798:19b-42: yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni //
T02D1798:19b-43: ci nus par yang rjes su bsrung //
T02D1798:19b-44: sems can don la mi phyogs dang //
T02D1798:19b-45: theg pa dman la dgod mi bya //
T02D1798:19b-46: 'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spong //
T02D1798:19b-47: rtag tu mya ngan 'dar mi chags //
T02D1798:19b-48: lha dang lha min gsang ba pa //
T02D1798:20a-2: / phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang //
T02D1798:20a-4: / de ltar dam tshig gsungs pa dag / blo ldan khyod kyis rtag tu srungs //
T02D1798:20a-5: de nas bla ma des gsungs pa'i //
T02D1798:20a-6: sngom pa legs par gzung bya'o //
T02D1798:20a-7: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02D1798:20a-8: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02D1798:20a-9: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02D1798:20a-10: bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1798:20a-11: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D1798:20a-12: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D1798:20a-13: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i //
T02D1798:20a-14: sngom pa deng nas gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1798:20a-15: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D1798:20a-16: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag / yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1798:20a-17: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1798:20a-18: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D1798:20a-19: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D1798:20a-20: nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02D1798:20a-21: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02D1798:20a-22: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02D1798:20a-23: padma'i rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D1798:20a-24: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02D1798:20a-25: dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1798:20a-26: las kyi rigs mchod chen po la //
T02D1798:20a-27: sngom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D1798:20a-28: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1798:20a-29: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D1798:20a-30: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D1798:20a-31: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D1798:20a-32: sems can ma lus don gyi phyir //
T02D1798:20a-33: bdag gis sngom pa ma lus gzung //
T02D1798:20a-34: ma rgal ba dag bsgral bar bgyi //
T02D1798:20a-35: ma grol ba dag bdag gis dgrol //
T02D1798:20a-36: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs pa byung zhing //
T02D1798:20a-37: mya ngan 'das la dgod par bgyi //
T02D1798:20a-38: lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis //
T02D1798:20a-39: mi dge ba ni bcu po dag / bag med pa yi gnas gyur pa //
T02D1798:20a-40: chang ni rnam par spang bar bya //
T02D1798:20a-41: de bzhin lta dang lha min dang //
T02D1798:20a-42: gsang ba dag brnyas pa dang //
T02D1798:20a-43: mtshan ma la sogs 'gom pa rnams //
T02D1798:20a-44: dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni //
T02D1798:20a-45: ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar /
T02D1798:20a-46: bdag ni rab tu ldog par bgyi //
T02D1798:20a-47: de ltar sdom pa bzung ba'i slob ma la snying
T02D1798:20a-48: ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral bar rdo rje khu
T02D1798:20a-49: tshur gyis dri'i thig le gsum byas te /
T02D1798:20a-50: nyi ma dang padma dang zla ba la yi ge
T02D1798:20a-51: gsum so sor bkod la sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D1798:20b-0: las thams cad pa'i sngags @20b kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1798:20b-1: de nas mchod pa byas te spyi bor me tog dang spos so //
T02D1798:20b-2: mar me dang dri ni snying gar ro //
T02D1798:20b-4: de re re la yang tshig 'di sngon du 'gro bas sbyin te /
T02D1798:20b-5: dus 'di nyid nas bzung nas ni //
T02D1798:20b-6: 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos par //
T02D1798:20b-7: mchod pa kun dang ldan pa ni //
T02D1798:20b-8: dus kun du ni bde bar ma nos //
T02D1798:20b-10: de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis mngon par
T02D1798:20b-11: bsngags pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa shing drang
T02D1798:20b-12: po 'o ma can las byung ba srin bus ma
T02D1798:20b-13: zos pa / bu ga dang mdzes pa med pa
T02D1798:20b-14: drang pos byas pa la dri zhim pos byugs shing
T02D1798:20b-15: rtse mo me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa slob
T02D1798:20b-16: ma shar phyogs su kha bltas te mi smra bar
T02D1798:20b-17: zos pa / so shing bca'o // bza' ba zin nas mdun drag por dor ro //
T02D1798:20b-18: de nas so shing gi rtse mo'i ltas blta ste /
T02D1798:20b-19: phyogs mtshams kyi dbye bas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las brgyad 'grub pa'am /
T02D1798:20b-20: yang na bdag la lta ba'am rtse mo gyen du 'greng na dngos grub mchog 'grub po //
T02D1798:20b-21: de bzhin du shar du bltas na dngos grub 'bring 'grub bo //
T02D1798:20b-22: mtshams dang byang du bltas na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'grub po //
T02D1798:20b-23: thur du bltas nas 'og gi dngos grub 'grub bo //
T02D1798:20b-24: de nas ngag gi nyes pa sbyang ba'i phyir 'thor
T02D1798:20b-25: 'thung byas te kha bkrus nas hub gsum 'thung du
T02D1798:20b-27: aom hr'i: bi shuddh'a ya sarbba dharm'a ya sarbba p'a pam ni tsa sam shoddh'a ya /
T02D1798:20b-28: sarbba bi kalpa aa ba na ya h'um /
T02D1798:20b-29: zhes bzlas la chu khyor ba gsum 'thung du gzhug go //
T02D1798:20b-30: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams //
T02D1798:20b-31: au dumb'a ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02D1798:20b-32: brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung ngo //
T02D1798:20b-33: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba //
T02D1798:20b-34: de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste //
T02D1798:20b-35: gang gis mnyam med sems can don //
T02D1798:20b-36: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02D1798:20b-37: bskal pa bye ma du ma ru //
T02D1798:20b-38: sdig pa byas par gyur pa gang //
T02D1798:20b-41: grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i //
T02D1798:20b-42: tshul la gnas pa smos ci dgos //
T02D1798:20b-43: skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni //
T02D1798:20b-45: gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la //
T02D1798:21a-2: de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun //
T02D1798:21a-3: sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad //
T02D1798:21a-4: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02D1798:21a-5: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
T02D1798:21a-6: gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas la //
T02D1798:21a-7: bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni //
T02D1798:21a-8: bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun //
T02D1798:21a-9: yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa //
T02D1798:21a-10: de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la //
T02D1798:21a-11: sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur ;
T02D1798:21a-12: / theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02D1798:21a-13: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02D1798:21a-14: khyed rnams der ni dong bas na //
T02D1798:21a-15: rang 'byung skal ba chen po la //
T02D1798:21a-16: 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
T02D1798:21a-17: de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1798:21a-18: yod dang med las rnam par 'das //
T02D1798:21a-19: nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med //
T02D1798:21a-20: zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyis //
T02D1798:21a-21: rab tu mi rtogs gnas med pa //
T02D1798:21a-22: spros pa kun dang bral ba ste //
T02D1798:21a-23: spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
T02D1798:21a-24: las dang bya ba la sogs bral //
T02D1798:21a-25: bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi //
T02D1798:21a-26: theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di yi //
T02D1798:21a-27: tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur //
T02D1798:21a-28: zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di dag ni theg pa chen
T02D1798:21a-29: po'i chos bshad pas spro ba yang dag par bskyed
T02D1798:21a-30: par bya'o // de nas las thams cad pa bzlas
T02D1798:21a-31: pa'i srung skud mdud pa gsum bor ba dpung ba
T02D1798:21a-33: de nas sngags kyis btab pa'i ku shal sngas dang stan byas te /
T02D1798:21a-35: rmi lam gyi ltas mthong ba dge ba'am mi dge
T02D1798:21a-36: ba nang par dus su nga la zlos shig ces
T02D1798:21a-37: bsgo'o // rmi lam mi dge ba na las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis gzhom mo //
T02D1798:21a-38: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te /
T02D1798:21a-39: nam mkha'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bkod
T02D1798:21a-40: la dra ba dang ra bas kha sbyar gyi sbyor
T02D1798:21a-42: de dag ni lta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1798:21a-44: // / de nas slob dpon rdo rje sems dpa'i ting
T02D1798:21a-45: nge 'dzin la gnas pas rang bzhin gyis dkyil 'khor
T02D1798:21a-46: bskul ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gdab pa'i skud pa
T02D1798:21a-47: dang tshon gyis dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir sa la
T02D1798:21a-48: gdab pa dang gnyis bya ste /
T02D1798:21a-49: de la thog mar rang gi phyag rgya ma bslabs pa 'byongs pa dang thig skud bkal te /
T02D1798:21a-50: de nas tshon lnga so sor btsos nas bdud rtsi
T02D1798:21b-0: lnga dang dri zhim pos @21b byugs shing gser la
T02D1798:21b-1: sogs pa'i snod gtsang mar bzhag la /
T02D1798:21b-2: rigs re re la yang rang rang gtso bor byas
T02D1798:21b-3: pa'i lnga lnga yod pas skud pa re re la
T02D1798:21b-4: yang lnga lnga ste nyi shu rtsa lnga bya'o //
T02D1798:21b-5: sngags pas bdag nyid kyi mig g-yas g-yon la dza dkar dmar las bskyed pa'i nyi zla bskyed la /
T02D1798:21b-6: de nyid la yang rdzas so sor mtshon pa mig
T02D1798:21b-7: gi gzim ma 'dren par byed pa'i 'bar ba'i lta
T02D1798:21b-8: bas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du bltas nam mkha'i
T02D1798:21b-9: dbyings thams cad du bltas te /
T02D1798:21b-10: dza las 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus ye
T02D1798:21b-11: shes sems dpa'i thugs ka nas ye shes kyi skud
T02D1798:21b-12: pa drangs te / yi ge lngas drang pa'i dam tshig gis skud pa la thim par byas nas /
T02D1798:21b-13: las thams cad pa'i dri'i chus bsang gtor byas pa'i dri dang me tog la sogs pa phul nas /
T02D1798:21b-20: 'khal zhing sgril ba'i dus su yang /
T02D1798:21b-21: aom aa n+yo n+y'a nu ga ta sarbba dhamm'a pa
T02D1798:21b-22: ra spa ra aa nu ga ta sarbba dharmm'a: aa
T02D1798:21b-23: dya nt'a nu ga ta sarbba dharmm'a nu pra be
T02D1798:21b-25: zhes rjes su dran pas bzlas shing bsgril lo //
T02D1798:21b-26: de nas tshon sna gcig pa'i las thams cad pa'i
T02D1798:21b-27: skud pa byas te dri zhim po dang bdud rtsi
T02D1798:21b-28: lnga dang las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i yungs kar
T02D1798:21b-30: tsandan dkar po'i chus byug par bya'o //
T02D1798:21b-31: skud pa yi ge gsum gyi nang du chud par bya'o //
T02D1798:21b-32: skud pa bsngogs shing bzung nas rdzdza gsum gyis bton
T02D1798:21b-33: la rang rang gi phyag rgya ma la gtad par
T02D1798:21b-34: bya'o // shes rab med par bdag nyid gcig pu
T02D1798:21b-35: spyod na slob dpon rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge
T02D1798:21b-36: 'dzin la gnas la slob ma rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1798:21b-37: dam bdud rtsi thab sbyor du bsams te shar gyi
T02D1798:21b-39: nub dang shar na gnas pa'i slob dpon slob mas khu tshur g-yon gyis bzung nas /
T02D1798:21b-40: aom badzra m'a ya s'u tra ma ti kra ma h'um /
T02D1798:21b-42: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i de
T02D1798:21b-43: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gro ba sems can gyi
T02D1798:21b-44: don gyi phyir gshegs shig par thig gi sgras bskul
T02D1798:21b-46: de nas slob dpon gnod sbyin gyi phyogs su kha
T02D1798:21b-47: bltas la slob ma gshin rje'i phyogs su kha bltas
T02D1798:21b-48: te nam mkha' la thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-1: brgya byin gyi phyogs su kha bltas la thig gnyis pa gdab par bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-2: de bzhin du grva dang phyogs la sogs pa gdab par bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-3: de la dang po ni tshangs pa'i thig go //
T02D1798:22a-4: gnyis pa ni grva'i thig go //
T02D1798:22a-5: gsum pa ni phyi rol gyi thig go //
T02D1798:22a-6: bzhi pa ni so sor cha rnam par dbye ba'i thig go //
T02D1798:22a-7: de nas nam mkha' la btab pa bzhin du sa la gdab par bya ste /
T02D1798:22a-8: tshangs thig gi g-yas g-yon du ri mo dgu dgu btab pas cha bcu bcur 'gyur te /
T02D1798:22a-9: spyir cha chen po nyi shur 'gyur ro //
T02D1798:22a-10: de re re'i nang du thig gsum gsum btab pas snam bu bzhi bzhir 'gyur te /
T02D1798:22a-11: des cha phran brgyad cur 'gyur ro //
T02D1798:22a-12: de bzhin du tshangs thig gnyis pa'i g-yas g-yon yang gdab par shes par bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-13: de la lnga pa'i dang pos ni rab ba'i tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-14: lnga pa bzhi pas ni 'gram gyi tshon sna lnga sa bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-15: drug pa'i gsum pas ni sgo'i steng logs kyi tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-16: dang po'i gsum pas ni sgo khyud kyi tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-17: gnyis pa'i gnyis pas ni logs kyi tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-18: dang po'i bzhi pa dang gnyis pa'i dang pos ni khyams kyis bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-19: lnga pa'i gnyis pa dang gsum pas ni kha khyer gyi sa bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-20: lnga pa'i bzhi pas kha khyer gyi sa bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-21: drug pa'i dang po dang gnyis pas dra ba dang dra phyed kyis bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-22: des ni dkyil 'khor gyi gnas bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1798:22a-23: dang po'i bzhi pas ni nang gi ka ba'i sa bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-24: gnyis pa'i gsum pas ni phyi'i ka ba'i sa bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-25: de nas tsandan gyi phur bu la /
T02D1798:22a-26: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarba bigg'am bam h'um /
T02D1798:22a-27: zhes lan bdun bzlas bas dbus kyi lte ba la
T02D1798:22a-28: btab la gsum pa'i gsum pa la rdo rje ra
T02D1798:22a-29: ba'i sar ri mo gnyis su g-yas skor du zlum
T02D1798:22a-31: de nas dgu pa'i dang po dang gnyis pa dang
T02D1798:22a-32: gsum pa gsum ri mo gnyis kyis bskor ba khor
T02D1798:22a-33: yug te padma'i phreng pa'i sa bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-34: de'i 'og gi cha gsum la nang gi phyed dang
T02D1798:22a-35: gnyis kyis ni khor yug chen po ste phyi rol
T02D1798:22a-36: gyi rdo rje ra ba'i sa bskor bar bya'o //
T02D1798:22a-37: de dag kyang dang po ri mo nang nas bskor ro //
T02D1798:22a-38: de nas phyi rol nas bskor te /
T02D1798:22a-39: de'i lhag ma phyed dang gnyis kyis ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1798:22a-40: tha ma'i cha bran stong pa gnyis kyis ni dkyil 'khor gyi nye 'khor gyi sa bya'o//
T02D1798:22b-0: @22b de nas gsum pa'i bzhi pa la 'dod pa'i lha mo'i snam bu'o //
T02D1798:22b-1: bzhi pa'i dang po dang bzhi pa'i gnyis pa dang
T02D1798:22b-2: bzhi pa'i gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i bzhi pa rnams
T02D1798:22b-3: gcig tu byas pa ni sgo dang 'brel pa'i phyi'i
T02D1798:22b-4: snam bu'o // de nas mig gnyis la dhi las
T02D1798:22b-5: nyi zla bskyed pa'i khro bo'i lta bas nang gi
T02D1798:22b-6: thig gdab nas khro bo'i mig gi lta stangs kyi
T02D1798:22b-7: 'od zer gyis bgegs bsal la phyi'i thig gdab par
T02D1798:22b-8: snam bu'o // bya ste / sngar btab pa rnams la ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1798:22b-9: de la ra ba'i tshon sna lnga dang 'gram gyi
T02D1798:22b-10: tshon sna lnga sgo dang 'brel pa phyi'i sgo'i nang
T02D1798:22b-12: rta babs bzhi ni chur sgo'i bzhi 'gyur snam phran bcu drug gi tshad do //
T02D1798:22b-13: de la chu srin gyi mgo la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams dgod pa'i sa bya'o //
T02D1798:22b-14: ra ba dang 'brel pa'i snam phran dang po dang
T02D1798:22b-15: gnyis pa la gar mkhan gyi lha mo mchod pas
T02D1798:22b-17: gsum pa la ni rin chen pha gu'i sa'o //
T02D1798:22b-18: bzhi pa dang lnga ba la ni dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang nyi zla'o //
T02D1798:22b-19: drug pa la rdo rje nor bu phyed pa'o //
T02D1798:22b-20: sgo'i logs dang 'gram rnams su rnga yab 'bar ba
T02D1798:22b-21: dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rlung gis bskyod pa'o
T02D1798:22b-22: // chos kyi 'khor lo'i g-yas g-yon du ri dags kyis mtshan pa /
T02D1798:22b-23: phyi rol gyi grva bzhir gser gyi bum pa brgyad
T02D1798:22b-24: dang mchod pa la sogs pa ci rigs par bri
T02D1798:22b-26: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
T02D1798:22b-27: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1798:22b-28: rta babs bzhi yis rnams par brgyan //
T02D1798:22b-29: thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02D1798:22b-30: ka pa brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes //
T02D1798:22b-31: dra ba dra phyed rdo rje dang //
T02D1798:22b-32: nor bu zla bas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1798:22b-33: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //
T02D1798:22b-34: rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras //
T02D1798:22b-35: bum pa ka ba rdo rje phyed //
T02D1798:22b-36: pre yi phreng ni rim bzhin gnas //
T02D1798:22b-37: ba dan dril bus mdzes byas la //
T02D1798:22b-38: rnga yab rnams kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1798:22b-39: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ni //
T02D1798:22b-40: mchod pa rnam pa lnga yis brgyan //
T02D1798:22b-41: khru ni bcu gnyis tshad dang ldan //
T02D1798:22b-42: tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1798:22b-43: bum pa brgyad dang ldan pa bri //
T02D1798:22b-44: kun nas yongs su zlum por bya //
T02D1798:22b-45: de dag ni thig gi cho ga'o /
T02D1798:22b-47: // / de nas rdul tshon byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1798:23a-0: kha dog lnga la h'um la sogs pa kha dog lnga dang @23a * //
T02D1798:23a-1: ldan pa so sor bstims la /

T02D1798:23a-5: zhes brjod pas byin gyis brlabs te /

T02D1798:23a-20: dbus dang shar la sogs pa'i re'u cha rnams ni nag po dang /

T02D1798:23a-26: sgo dang sgo'i snam bu ni phyogs kyi snam bu'o //

T02D1798:23a-29: rje gshed kyi sbyor bas gzhom mo //

T02D1798:23a-38: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'a na bidy'a r'a dza h'um phat /

T02D1798:23a-44: rdo rje la sogs pa thugs kyi phyag rgya'am /

T02D1798:23b-4: rtse dgu pa'o // po che dang / padma dang

T02D1798:23b-6: rtse dgu pa'o // po che dang / / rin po che dang /

T02D1798:23b-15: 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi snam bu'i grva bzhir me long dang /
T02D1798:23b-19: padma'i steng na zla ba la gnas pa'i gzugs rdo
T02D1798:23b-20: rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rim pa bzhin du

T02D1798:23b-23: gzhan sems dpa' dag ni gtso bo'i kha dog dang
T02D1798:23b-24: phyag mtshan dang mthun par bri'o//

T02D1798:23b-27: // lho'i sgor ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rdo rje'i dbyug to'o //
T02D1798:23b-28: nub sgor ni rta mgrin gyi padma 'od rnon po dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1798:23b-29: byang sgor ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi rdo rje rgya gram mo //
T02D1798:23b-31: ni mi g-yo mgon gyi ral gri'o //
T02D1798:23b-32: lho nub mtshams su ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyal po'i rgyal po'i lcags kyu'o //
T02D1798:23b-33: nub byang mtshams su ni dbyug sngon gyi rdo rje dbyug pa'o //
T02D1798:23b-34: byang shar mtshams su ni stobs po che'i tri sh'u la'o //
T02D1798:23b-35: shar stod du ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur pa'i
T02D1798:23b-36: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa gtsug tor gyis mtshan pa'o
T02D1798:23b-37: // nub smad du ni gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D1798:23b-38: de yang rang gi sngags bzlas shing thun mtshams su bri'o //
T02D1798:23b-39: de dag ni tshon dbye ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D1798:23b-40: de nas phyag rgya ma legs par 'byongs pa dang /
T02D1798:23b-41: dang po sbyor bas snyoms par 'jug pa'i cho ga bya'o //
T02D1798:23b-43: badzra dhri ka la sogs pa'i lha so so'i mtshan
T02D1798:23b-44: gyi sngags kyis bton nas so so'i gdan la rdzogs

T02D1798:23b-47: 'phro bas phyogs bcu'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo dam
T02D1798:24a-1: drangs la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod de /
T02D1798:24a-2: gshin rje gshed la sogs pas dgug pa dang /
T02D1798:24a-6: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo la ni rnam par snang

T02D1798:24a-8: rkang pa'i bar du dgod pa'o //
T02D1798:24a-9: gnas gsum du sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsum po dgod pa dang /
T02D1798:24a-10: sems dpa' gsum gyi mthar thug pa dgod cing byin gyis brlab po /
T02D1798:24a-11: 'khor gyi lha rnams la ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje dang /
T02D1798:24a-12: ye shes sems dpa' dang bzhi ste phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D1798:24a-15: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D1798:24a-16: 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1798:24a-18: // / de nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mnyes par bya ste /
T02D1798:24a-19: me tog gi char gyis ni lha rnams kyi dbu la'o //
T02D1798:24a-20: dri dang bdug spos kyi ni shangs la'o //
T02D1798:24a-25: yon chab dang zhabs bsil ni phyag dang bzhabs la'o //
T02D1798:24a-27: mchod pa rnam pa lnga la mchog bstan //
T02D1798:24a-28: zhes gsungs pas 'jig rten pa dang thun mong ma

T02D1798:24a-30: byung bas na nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su gtogs
T02D1798:24a-31: pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin gyi
T02D1798:24a-33: de nas nang gi mchod pa byas te /
T02D1798:24a-34: phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug pa las bla na med pa'i mchod pa brtsam ste /
T02D1798:24a-35: byang chub sems kyi phra rab bsags pa las nam

T02D1798:24a-42: gyis sbyangs la dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la dbul
T02D1798:24a-43: bar bya zhing bdag nyid kyang tshim par bya ba
T02D1798:24a-44: 'di nyid ni gsang ba'i mchod pa'o //

T02D1798:25a-0: @25a * // khyod kyis 'dod pa rab rdzogs mdzod //
T02D1798:25a-1: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D1798:25a-2: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D1798:25a-3: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D1798:25a-5: de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes //
T02D1798:25a-7: / gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni //
T02D1798:25a-8: kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog / ces lan gsum brjod do //
T02D1798:25a-9: 'di dag ni slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1798:25a-11: // / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po dang slob ma'i
T02D1798:25a-12: bar du yol bas bcad nas las thams cad pa'i
T02D1798:25a-13: chus bkrus pa'i ras dmar po'i gdong g-yogs kyis bkab
T02D1798:25a-14: la / sdug pa khyod su yin zhes lan gsum dri'o //
T02D1798:25a-15: des kyang sdug pa bdag ni skal ba bzang po'o //
T02D1798:25a-16: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D1798:25a-17: de nas me tog phreng ba 'dzin pas sgor yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D1798:25a-19: yul 'khor khyim dang glang po rta //
T02D1798:25a-20: gser dang mu tig byi ru dang //
T02D1798:25a-21: nor bu dang ni khyad par rdzas //
T02D1798:25a-22: bu dang chung ma bdag nyid dang //
T02D1798:25a-23: bran pho bran mo bcas rnams kun //
T02D1798:25a-24: ded nas brtsams te dbul bar bgyi //
T02D1798:25a-25: zhes yon gyi bye brag dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1798:25a-26: de nas snying gar rdo rje bzhag la /
T02D1798:25a-27: aom sarba yo ga tsitta au t'a t'a y'a mi //
T02D1798:25a-28: su ra ta sa ma ya stam ho //
T02D1798:25a-29: zhes pas byang chub tu sems bskyed la //
T02D1798:25a-30: siddhi badzr'a ya tha su kham /
T02D1798:25a-31: zhes pas 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o //
T02D1798:25a-32: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis /
T02D1798:25a-33: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu
T02D1798:25a-34: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la smra
T02D1798:25a-35: bar ma byed cig / dad pa dang mi ldan
T02D1798:25a-36: pa rnams la yang ma yin no zhes brjod par
T02D1798:25a-37: bya'o // de nas gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i
T02D1798:25a-38: gsang sngags kyis yol ba'i nang du bkug cing tshud
T02D1798:25a-39: par byas nas sam yang na /
T02D1798:25a-41: zhes bya ba'i yi ge lnga yis nang du chud
T02D1798:25a-42: par byas la de nas snga ma bzhin du sdom
T02D1798:25a-44: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyi /
T02D1798:25a-45: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyang thob na /
T02D1798:25b-0: dngos grub @25b gzhan lta ci smos te /
T02D1798:25b-1: de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yi /
T02D1798:25b-2: dngos grub 'di dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba
T02D1798:25b-3: rnams la ma smra shig dam tshig nyams par gyur
T02D1798:25b-4: ta re zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1798:25b-5: de nas slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag la /
T02D1798:25b-6: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D1798:25b-7: snying la yang dag zhugs par gyur //
T02D1798:25b-9: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D1798:25b-10: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D1798:25b-12: de nas thod pa na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi 'thung du gzhug te /
T02D1798:25b-13: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D1798:25b-14: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D1798:25b-15: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ster //
T02D1798:25b-16: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung shig / aom badzra aud ga tha:/
T02D1798:25b-17: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D1798:25b-18: deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga
T02D1798:25b-19: yin gyis ngas 'di byos shig ces brjod pa gang
T02D1798:25b-20: yin pa de yang bya dgos so //
T02D1798:25b-21: khyod kyis ngal brnyas par ma byed cig / mi
T02D1798:25b-22: bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas nas dmyal
T02D1798:25b-23: bar lhung bar gyur ta re zhes brjod do //
T02D1798:25b-24: de nas de skad smras pa la /
T02D1798:25b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlobs
T02D1798:25b-27: shig / rdo rjes sems dpa' bdag la 'bar par
T02D1798:25b-28: gyur cig ces gsol ba lan gsum gdab par bya'o//
T02D1798:25b-29: de nas dbab snod slob ma de snang ba mtha' yas su bsams la /
T02D1798:25b-30: yan lag thams cad la yi ge aa dmar po
T02D1798:25b-31: bkod la snying gar lam yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1798:25b-32: dbang chen ser po grub bzhi grva bzhi la rdo
T02D1798:25b-33: rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa de'i dbus su yi
T02D1798:25b-34: ge h'um ngo // bam yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1798:25b-35: chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po bum pas mtshan pa lte
T02D1798:25b-36: ge h'um ngo // bar bsam / yam yongs su
T02D1798:25b-37: gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu 'dra ba
T02D1798:25b-38: ba dan gyis mtshan pa rkang pa'i 'og tu'o //
T02D1798:25b-39: ram la me'i dkyil 'khor gsum mdoms su bsam /
T02D1798:25b-42: de nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i dzheem rkang mthil nas
T02D1798:25b-43: rkang gi bu gnas rlung gis me sbar ba la
T02D1798:25b-44: sogs pa'o // badzra aa be sha ya ste bha ya ra ra ra ra /
T02D1798:25b-45: tsa la ya tsa la ya /
T02D1798:25b-47: zhes dril bu'i sgra dang bcas pas dbab par bya'o //
T02D1798:25b-49: zhes pas brtan par bya ste /
T02D1798:26a-0: de nas lce la yi ge aa dmar po @26a * //
T02D1798:26a-2: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i gtam yongs su smros shig ces dri'o //
T02D1798:26a-3: de nas me tog gi phreng ba /
T02D1798:26a-5: zhes brjod la dkyil 'khor du dor ro //
T02D1798:26a-6: me tog gang la bab pa de ni de'i lha'o //
T02D1798:26a-7: me tog bab ba'i mtshan ma ni lha'i re'u cha'i gnas las shes bar bya'o //
T02D1798:26a-8: de yang sku stod dang spyi gtsug tu bab na dngos grub mchog 'grub bo //
T02D1798:26a-9: zhal la bab na sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub bo //
T02D1798:26a-10: sku'i dbus su bab na dngos grub brgyad do //
T02D1798:26a-11: sku smad du bab na zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub po //
T02D1798:26a-12: sku dang nye na ni dngos grub nye ba'o //
T02D1798:26a-13: ring na ni dngos grub ring ngo //
T02D1798:26a-14: gnyis kyi bar du lhung na ni gang nye ba'i rigs so //
T02D1798:26a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gnas las phyi rol du rgal
T02D1798:26a-16: na dad pa chung ste dman ba'i dngos grub 'grub
T02D1798:26a-17: bo // re kh'a la phog na skyar la dor ro //
T02D1798:26a-18: snying po la phog na gang yang rung ba 'grub po //
T02D1798:26a-19: bar mnyam po'am bdag gi mdun du lhung na lan gsum spogs te dor ro //
T02D1798:26a-20: des kyang nang du ma phog na skal ba med bas slar gtang ngo //
T02D1798:26a-21: de dag ni slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1798:26a-23: // / de nas babs ba'i lha de rnams kyis phreng ba mgo la bcing zhing /
T02D1798:26a-24: aom pra ti grihna sva mi mam sa tva ma h'a ba la /
T02D1798:26a-25: zhes brjod pas phreng bas dbang bskur ro //
T02D1798:26a-26: de nas mig gis ji ltar mthong zhes dri'o //
T02D1798:26a-27: dkar po mthong na dngos grub mchog 'grub pa'o //
T02D1798:26a-28: ser po mthong na rgyas ba'i ye shes so //
T02D1798:26a-29: nag po mthong na mngon spyod kyi ye shes so //
T02D1798:26a-30: sna tshogs pa mthong nas gang yang rung ba'i dngos grub bo //
T02D1798:26a-32: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D1798:26a-33: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02D1798:26a-34: mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad pa //
T02D1798:26a-35: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02D1798:26a-36: ces brjod la sngags 'di brjod do //
T02D1798:26a-37: aom badzra satva sa manta tsaksh'u dgha ta na ta da par /
T02D1798:26a-38: audgha ta ya ti sarbb'a ksho badzra tsakshu aa nutta ra /
T02D1798:26a-39: zhes brjod la gdong g-yogs bkrol te /
T02D1798:26a-40: de nas gnod mdzes nas brtsams te rdo rje 'chad chen po'i bar du lha rnams bstan to //
T02D1798:26a-41: de nas phyag rgya ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i
T02D1798:26a-42: byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer nyungs kar lha
T02D1798:26a-43: bus nam mkha'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
T02D1798:26b-0: @26b bum pa na gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa yab yum la thim nas /
T02D1798:26b-1: de yongs su gyur pa'i chus spyi bor chu'i dbang bskur te tshigs bcad dang sngags 'dis sbyin no //
T02D1798:26b-2: gsang gsum dam tshig las byung ba'i //
T02D1798:26b-3: ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med //
T02D1798:26b-4: lha yi chu yis dag pa yi //
T02D1798:26b-5: mi bskyod pa yi dbang bskur ro //
T02D1798:26b-6: aom badzra a'a darsha dzny'a na aa bhi shi nytsa /
T02D1798:26b-8: de bzhin du bris pas sam lugs ma'i dbu rgyan
T02D1798:26b-9: la dar gyi cod pan gyis mtshan pa la rin
T02D1798:26b-10: chen 'byung ldan yab yum bsgoms la /
T02D1798:26b-11: snga ma bzhin du nam mkha'i dbyings na bzhugs ba'i
T02D1798:26b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phab pas de yongs
T02D1798:26b-13: su gyur pa'i dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur ro //
T02D1798:26b-15: sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid che //
T02D1798:26b-16: dbu rgyan rin chen dam pa ste //
T02D1798:26b-17: rin chen kun gyi mchog 'gro bas //
T02D1798:26b-18: rdzogs sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ro //
T02D1798:26b-19: aom badzra sa mant'a dzny'a na ra tna ma ku ti aa bhi shinytsa /
T02D1798:26b-21: rdo rje 'od dpag med pa yab yum gyis dbang bskur bar bsgoms te /
T02D1798:26b-22: snga ma'i chogs ye shes sems dpa' phab ste /
T02D1798:26b-23: de yongs su gyur ba'i rdo rjes dbang bskur ro //
T02D1798:26b-25: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02D1798:26b-26: mi phyed rdo rje'i 'od gsal ba //
T02D1798:26b-27: dam chos 'byung ba'i sgor gyur pas //
T02D1798:26b-28: rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur ro //
T02D1798:26b-29: aom pra ti aa be sha dzny'a na badzra aa bhi shi nytsa /
T02D1798:26b-31: dril bul don yod grub pa yab yum rdzogs par bsgoms te /
T02D1798:26b-32: snga ma bzhin du phab ba'i cho ga byas la
T02D1798:26b-33: de yongs su gyur ba'i rdo rje dang dril bu'o
T02D1798:26b-34: // rdo rje dang dril bu bsnol la bdag po'i dbang bskur ro //
T02D1798:26b-36: thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi //
T02D1798:26b-37: 'gro don mnyam med byed ba dang //
T02D1798:26b-38: mchod ba'i las kun rdzogs byed pas //
T02D1798:26b-39: rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur ro //
T02D1798:26b-40: aom badzra kri ta aa nu shsh'a na dzny'a na badzra ba te aa bhi shi nytsa /
T02D1798:26b-42: de nas snga ma bzhin du me long gi gzugs
T02D1798:26b-43: la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sku
T02D1798:26b-44: phab la / de yongs su gyur pa me long du byas te /
T02D1798:26b-45: me long gi gzugs slob ma la bstan te 'di skad du brjod do //
T02D1798:26b-46: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'i //
T02D1798:26b-47: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02D1798:27a-2: rang lha'i gzugs ni shes par gyis //
T02D1798:27a-3: aom pra ti bi ma la a'a darsha bi ma la aa bhi shinytsa /
T02D1798:27a-5: de bzhin du spyi bor rnam bar snang mdzad yab
T02D1798:27a-6: yum bsgoms la snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
T02D1798:27a-7: pa rnams phab la de yongs su gyur ba las
T02D1798:27a-8: spyi bo nas rkang ba'i mthar thug ba'i bar du
T02D1798:27a-9: lus la khyab par bstims la bab pa'i lha'i cha
T02D1798:27a-11: ming ni thog mar dbal tha mar rdo rje'o //
T02D1798:27a-12: de'i 'og tu gnang ba'i phyir de ni kyi yis bod ba'o //
T02D1798:27a-14: rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas //
T02D1798:27a-15: byang chub snying po'i bar du ni //
T02D1798:27a-16: cis kyang mi shes mi g-yo bas //
T02D1798:27a-17: rdo rje'i ming du rab tu grags //
T02D1798:27a-18: aom bi shuddha dha rma dh'a tu dzny'a na n'a ma aa bhi shinytsa /
T02D1798:27a-20: de nas rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig med par
T02D1798:27a-21: ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'i snod ma yin
T02D1798:27a-22: pas / rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi khyad par gyi dam tshig dbog ste /
T02D1798:27a-23: h'um yongs su gyur ba'i rdo rje lag tu gtad la 'di skad du /
T02D1798:27a-24: 'di nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
T02D1798:27a-25: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1798:27a-26: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D1798:27a-27: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1798:27a-28: rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /
T02D1798:27a-29: ces pa ni rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
T02D1798:27a-30: de bzhin du aa: yongs su gyur pa las dril bu byin la /
T02D1798:27a-32: dril bu de nyid kyis zung la //
T02D1798:27a-33: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1798:27a-34: shes rab sgra yi rjes 'gro bshad //
T02D1798:27a-35: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D1798:27a-36: byang chub nga rgyal rdo rje bzhed //
T02D1798:27a-37: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02D1798:27a-38: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo
T02D1798:27a-39: nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral
T02D1798:27a-40: byas // rang bzhin dag ba'i sems dpa' mchog / srid pa mchog ni mdzad pa yin //
T02D1798:27a-41: zhes ba ni dril bu'i dam tshig go //
T02D1798:27a-42: de bzhin du aom de'i lus la bstims la /
T02D1798:27a-44: snying po bsnyen pa sogs spyad pas //
T02D1798:27a-45: phyag rgya chen por byin brlabs la //
T02D1798:27a-46: gzugs sogs 'dod ba'i dam tshig gis //
T02D1798:27a-47: gsang sngags ma tshang med par bzlas //
T02D1798:27a-48: rang rig pa yi ngo bo nyid //
T02D1798:27a-49: phyogs bcu dus gsum bzhugs pa ste //
T02D1798:27a-50: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1798:27a-51: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par gyis //
T02D1798:27b-0: @27b dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pas //
T02D1798:27b-1: bsten nas mi snang mngon shes dang //
T02D1798:27b-2: mkha' la rgyu dang lus ngag yid //
T02D1798:27b-4: de bas sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog / sngags kyi spyod mchog spyod pa rnams //
T02D1798:27b-5: 'dod pa thams cad bsten pa yis//
T02D1798:27b-6: chos kyi yi ge mchog nyid brnyes //
T02D1798:27b-7: bde dang sdug bsngal bde bdag min //
T02D1798:27b-8: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams bsten //
T02D1798:27b-9: ye shes don gnyer 'dod chags can //
T02D1798:27b-10: sbyor bas bsgrubs na myur du 'grub //
T02D1798:27b-11: sku gsung thugs ni yang dag 'grub //
T02D1798:27b-12: gang gzhan dman par bshad pa ni //
T02D1798:27b-14: sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pas so //
T02D1798:27b-15: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'i dam tshig go //
T02D1798:27b-16: de ltar sdom pa bzung ba'i slob mad de bzhin du yon gyis slob dpon mnyes bar byas la //
T02D1798:27b-17: bla ma la phyag btsal la tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1798:27b-18: 'dis dban gnod ba'i don du gsol ba gdab bar
T02D1798:27b-19: bya'o // byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
T02D1798:27b-20: ji ltar mchod chen gsol mdzad pa //
T02D1798:27b-21: bdag la bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir //
T02D1798:27b-22: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02D1798:27b-24: de nas shar gyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor chen po
T02D1798:27b-25: dang bar du khru 'am 'dom gyis chod par dkyil
T02D1798:27b-27: de'i steng du dbang stegs kyi khri bya ste /
T02D1798:27b-28: ras la gdan padma 'dab ma brgyad pa g-yas dang
T02D1798:27b-29: g-yon du seng ges mtshan pa bzhag ste steng du
T02D1798:27b-30: yang gdugs dang bla res bkab pa dang /
T02D1798:27b-31: g-yas g-yon du yang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis bklubs la /
T02D1798:27b-32: de nas slob dpon sbyor pa gsum rdzogs par bsgoms
T02D1798:27b-33: nas snga ma bzhin du thabs dang shes rab gnyis
T02D1798:27b-34: su med ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer
T02D1798:27b-35: gyis nam mkha'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul
T02D1798:27b-36: nas bum ba'i nang du chud bar byas te /
T02D1798:27b-37: de dag kyang spyan la sogs ba'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis bzung nas /
T02D1798:27b-39: sgra dang dri ro dang reg la sogs pas nam
T02D1798:27b-40: mkha'i khams gang ste de dag gi rig ba'i dbang
T02D1798:27b-41: bskur ba'i tshigs bcad ni 'di yin te /
T02D1798:27b-42: rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba //
T02D1798:27b-43: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02D1798:27b-44: gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi //
T02D1798:28a-0: @28a * // sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin par bya //
T02D1798:28a-2: de nas rdo rje brtul zhugs dang /
T02D1798:28a-4: rdo rje 'dzin pas dbugs dbyung ba la sogs ba byin la /
T02D1798:28a-5: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02D1798:28a-6: lha'i de kho na nyid bstan te /
T02D1798:28a-7: de yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis dag pa ni khru bcu gnyis so //
T02D1798:28a-8: tshangs ba'i gnas bzhi rnam par dag pa zur bzhi'o //
T02D1798:28a-9: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhin rnam bar dag pa ngos bzhi'o //
T02D1798:28a-10: dran pa nye bar gzhag ba bzhi rnam bar dag ba ni shar phyogs kyi sgo'o //
T02D1798:28a-11: yang dag bar sbong ba bzhi rnam bar dag ba ni lho'i sgo'o //
T02D1798:28a-12: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhin rnam par dag pa ni nub phyogs kyi sgo'o //
T02D1798:28a-13: dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang stobs lnga dag pa ni byang phyogs kyi sgo'o //
T02D1798:28a-14: bsam gtan bzhi rnam par dag pa ni sgo bzhi'o //

T02D1798:29a-12: mngon shes ldan pa nyis stong yin //
T02D1798:29a-13: rig pa 'dzin pa sum stong ste //
T02D1798:29a-14: rdo rje can ni 'gro kun bdag / zhi dang rgyas la sogs gang dang //

T02D1798:29a-18: zhes gsungs pas rgyud nyan pa dang /
T02D1798:29a-20: mchog dang thun mong sgrub pa dang /
T02D1798:29a-21: zhi ba la sogs pas sems can gyi don byed pa ste /

T02D1798:29a-23: de ltar phreng ba la sogs pa dgu po des
T02D1798:29a-24: ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sbrul ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1798:29a-25: du rig ba'i dbang bskur ba ste bum pa'i dbang
T02D1798:29a-27: / de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba sdar gyi

T02D1798:29a-29: pa dang / bdud rtsi rnam ba lnga dang dri'i chus byugs pa ste /

T02D1798:29a-33: 'khor lo la sogs ba rgyal srid sna bdun dang /
T02D1798:29a-34: gzugs sdu gu'i bye brag sna tshogs dang /
T02D1798:29a-35: sgra snyan ba'i bye brag sna tshogs dang /
T02D1798:29a-36: dri zhi ma ba'i bye brag sna tshogs dang /
T02D1798:29a-37: bza' btung la sogs pa'i ro zhim pa'i bye brag sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D1798:29a-38: gzugs kyi mchog padma can mtshan thams cad dang ldan
T02D1798:29a-39: pa'i lo grangs bcu drug lon pa logs par bslabs
T02D1798:29a-40: pa la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi yo byad tshogs par
T02D1798:29a-41: bshams te / tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su phyag rgya phul te /
T02D1798:29a-42: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas cho ga ji lta bar mchod par bya'o //
T02D1798:29a-43: de nas gsang ba'i dbang la tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab bar bya'o //
T02D1798:29a-44: rdo rje sems khyod sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde ba 'grub ba ste /
T02D1798:29a-45: rnam dag byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen sras su bcas pa rnams //
T02D1798:29b-0: yun @29b ring stong pa nyid bsgoms pas ni gdungs pa la //
T02D1798:29b-1: dga' ba'i yid 'ong bde chen po nyid kyis mnyes par mdzod //
T02D1798:29b-2: kye 'dod chags de ni dri med kun du bzang bo'i spyod pa ste //
T02D1798:29b-3: dga' ba'i 'dod chags rdo rje dam tshig la ni phye mdzad nas //
T02D1798:29b-4: dka' ba rnam ba drug po spyad pas shin tu gdungs pa yi //
T02D1798:29b-5: rab tu dgyes dbang 'dod pa'i bde ba nyid kyis 'jog par mdzod //
T02D1798:29b-6: byang chub sems ni rin chen 'bar phyung bas //
T02D1798:29b-7: ma lus rgyal ba rnams ni lus bskams la //
T02D1798:29b-8: rnam dag rdo rje las byung ye shes chu //
T02D1798:29b-9: dri med dri yi rin chen dbang bskur stsol //
T02D1798:29b-10: mnyam dang mi mnyam dod chags tshul dag bas //
T02D1798:29b-11: padma'i gnas su rdo rje mdzod gtong ba'i //
T02D1798:29b-12: sna tshogs sems dpa' sems can rlag 'gyur ba //
T02D1798:29b-13: sbyor ba gzhan min ma thogs bshad par gsol //
T02D1798:29b-14: rdo rje sems khyod sna tshogs bde bar byed pa yi //
T02D1798:29b-15: rdo rje padma phye ba'i tshul gyis sbyor mdzad de //
T02D1798:29b-16: rgyal ba kun gyi gzugs kyi sku ni rab ston nas //
T02D1798:29b-17: thams cad bde 'grub nyid kyis bdag dgyes par mdzod //
T02D1798:29b-18: de nas sngar tshogs kyi mchod pa'i sngon du bla mas kyang yid kyis sam //
T02D1798:29b-19: bris pas kyang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02D1798:29b-20: bdag po'i phyag rgyar mnyam par gzhag pas snyoms par
T02D1798:29b-21: 'jug pa'i tshogs byang chub kyi sems padma'i snod dam
T02D1798:29b-23: rol mo dang glu dbyangs dang bkra shis kyi tshigs
T02D1798:29b-24: su bcad ba'i sgra dang bcas pas brtse bas nam
T02D1798:29b-25: phyed kyi dus su rdo rje can gnyis pa lta
T02D1798:29b-26: bur dmigs la dam tshig gi phyag rgyas slob ma'i
T02D1798:29b-28: slob mas kyang blo brtan pas sangs rgyas thams cad

T02D1798:34a-49: de ltar zhal du phul yang spyan gyi 'od zer
T02D1798:34a-50: gyis reg pa tsam gyis mnyes par 'gyur ba'i don
T02D1798:34b-0: gyas na spyan la @34b dbul lo //
T02D1798:34b-1: de ni spyir mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1798:34b-2: de nas bye brag tu mnyes par bya ste /
T02D1798:34b-3: de nas shing khru gang la ras kyis dkris la rgyal po dang /
T02D1798:34b-6: gdol pa'i khyim nas las dang mthun par me blangs
T02D1798:34b-7: la de spar te btsugs nas rlung yab kyis g-yab
T02D1798:34b-8: cing / aom badzra rdzva la dzva la h'um phat /
T02D1798:34b-10: aom badzra aa na la ma h'a bh'um ta dzva
T02D1798:34b-11: la ya sa rbba du shat'a na h'um phat sv'a
T02D1798:34b-12: h'a / dri shya ho dza: h'um bam ho :bam ya stam /
T02D1798:34b-13: zhes pas dam tshig sems dpa' la bstims la spyi
T02D1798:34b-14: bo nas rkang pa'i bar du rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1798:34b-15: nas gnod mdzes kyi mthar thug pa'i bar byin gyis
T02D1798:34b-16: brlab pa dang / gnas gsum du sku gsung thugs
T02D1798:34b-17: rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas
T02D1798:34b-18: brlab pa dang / la / de nas mchod pa
T02D1798:34b-19: sngon du 'gro ba'i mar dgang blugs gsum mam bdun
T02D1798:34b-20: brlab pa dang / la / dbul lo // de nas bkra shis kyi yam shing ngo //
T02D1798:34b-25: ku sha rim pa bzhin du dbul lo ;
T02D1798:34b-26: / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha me lha ye
T02D1798:34b-27: shes sems dpa'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1798:34b-28: steng du h'um las nges par byung ba'i 'khor lo
T02D1798:34b-29: yongs su rdzogs par bsgoms la /
T02D1798:34b-31: aom ye hye hi bha ga b'a na sanni da
T02D1798:34b-32: pa nytsa na sa ma ye na tsa a'a k'a
T02D1798:34b-33: sa pra t'i tstsha a'a hu p'u dza n'a dam
T02D1798:34b-34: bra siddha me / zhes bya bas bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02D1798:34b-35: de ltar bstan pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor de la ye
T02D1798:34b-36: shes sems dpa' dgug pa la sogs pa byin gyis
T02D1798:34b-37: brlab pa'i cho ga bzhin du byas pa de la
T02D1798:34b-38: mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang /
T02D1798:34b-39: sbyin sreg gi khyad par gyis mnyes par byas la yi ge gsum gyis bdag gi thugs kar bsdu'o //
T02D1798:34b-40: de nas 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la mchod pa
T02D1798:34b-41: sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho gas ji
T02D1798:34b-42: lta ba bzhin du mnyes par bya ste bzod pa
T02D1798:34b-43: gsol la / las bcol la rang rang gi gnas su gtang ngo //
T02D1798:34b-44: de nas me lha ye shes sems dpa' la mchod yon dang /
T02D1798:34b-46: mchod pa dang bstod pas mnyes par byas la mar
T02D1798:34b-47: dgang blugs gsum phul te sngags 'dis gshegs su gsol
T02D1798:34b-48: lo // aom kri to ba sarbba satva rtha //
T02D1798:34b-49: siddhi ma dtt'a ya th'a nu ga /
T02D1798:34b-50: gatstsha tva'm bu ddha bi sha yam //
T02D1798:34b-51: pu ra na ra ga man ya tstsha mu:/
T02D1798:35a-0: de nas me lha dam tshig sems dpa' la tshogs kyi lhag ma dang sbyin sreg gi @35a * //
T02D1798:35a-1: lhag mas ci nus kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D1798:35a-2: de la dkyil 'khor gyi sngon du bgegs zhi bar byed na /
T02D1798:35a-3: mi rus phye mas gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyi phreng bas bya'o //
T02D1798:35a-4: slob ma'i sdig pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir g-yon phyogs su rtsod pur 'dug la /
T02D1798:35a-5: slob ma'i sor mo gung mo slob dpon gyi mtheb
T02D1798:35a-6: srin gyis bzung la til dang de'i sngags ci nus
T02D1798:35a-8: de nas me lha de nyid thugs kar bsdu sbyin
T02D1798:35a-9: sreg gi yo byad de dag slob dpon gyis yin
T02D1798:35a-10: pas gzhan gyis spyad du mi rung ngo //
T02D1798:35a-11: slob dpon gyis kyang ci rigs su spyad par bya'o //
T02D1798:35a-12: de nas dge ba'i rtsa pa bsdo ba dang /
T02D1798:35a-13: smon lam btab ste thab kyi nang chus bkru bar bya'o //
T02D1798:35a-14: de dag ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o /
T02D1798:35a-16: // / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi mthur rab gnas kyi cho ga bya ste /
T02D1798:35a-17: snga dro'i dus su slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad
T02D1798:35a-18: dang ldan pas bla re dang rgyal mtshan dang spos
T02D1798:35a-19: dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad
T02D1798:35a-25: 'bur du brkos pa la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor
T02D1798:35a-26: chen po'i byin gyis brlab pa'i cho gas ji lta
T02D1798:35a-27: ba bzhin du byin gyis brlab te /
T02D1798:35a-28: mchod pa thams cad kyis mnyes par byas la /
T02D1798:35a-29: 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du sems can gyi
T02D1798:35a-30: don gyi phyir rab tu bzhugs par gsol ba btab
T02D1798:35a-31: ste / de nas sbyin sreg gis mnyes par byas
T02D1798:35a-32: nas bkra shis par byin gyis brlab pa 'di ni
T02D1798:35a-34: thams cad stong pa zab cing phra bas na //
T02D1798:35a-35: rtog ge'i yul min 'khrul pas shes mi nus //
T02D1798:35a-36: des na de la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1798:35a-37: rim gnyis thabs kyi sngon 'gro'i cho ga yin //
T02D1798:35a-38: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
T02D1798:35a-39: slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa
T02D1798:35a-41: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bh'a shi ta dang /
